## Gaode map (in Chinese)

The zoom level has to be less than 3 in Gaode map.


```{r}
library(leafletplugins)

leaflet() %>%
   addTileGaodeMap() %>%
   setView(lat = 37.550339, lng = 104.114129, zoom = 4)
```


```{r}
leaflet() %>%
   addTileGaodeSatellite() %>%
   setView(lat = 37.550339, lng = 104.114129, zoom = 4)
```
